title: Client (Both launcher and game) constantly not responding
body: As of this month, my client and game both stop responding sometimes 5-10 times a day. Sometimes i have to alt F4 or end task but in the situations that i don't, it will start responding again after 10-20 seconds. When this happens during champ select i dodge which is out of my control. What in the hell was broken recently in the patches?

replies.body: Also would like to note that maybe saying the Launcher and Game Client going unresponsive may be inaccurate as i can hear the sounds playing normally (Countdowns, announcer, etc...)

Did that, took two days to figure out how to uninstall the game because for whatever reason it no longer has an uninstall file so i had to track down this Hextech shit and uninstalled then reinstalled and it still does the same thing. I've been playing the game since 2009 and from then to now, this has just started happening as of post 7.18. So last month, yes all my drivers and shit are up to date as well.

Having a program go completely unresponsive like that is most often the cause of your pc being unable to handle what the program was doing along with everything else running in the background. Let's try running a quick repair through the game client, and go ahead and try doing clean boot to see how League runs without anything else going in the background.
